name: CrystoFly
description:
Just a test for enjoyable flying  behavior.

Still a work in progress...

Controller:

left joy: move

Dpad_up/Dpad_down: move up / down

right joy: look

LT: boost

RB: pause engine

Keyboard:

left z/q/s/d: move

c / space: move up / down

arrows: look

shift: boost

x: pause engine
